description_zh: IT圈，原软媒论坛和IT之家社区，庞大人气和数量的兴趣圈和话题基地，分享知识、分享正能量、分享成长、分享前沿科技和数码世界都可以
description_en: The IT circle, formerly the Ruancai Forum and the IT Home community, is a huge and popular interest circle and topic base. You can share knowledge, positive energy, personal growth, cutting - edge technology, and the digital world here.
submitRequirements_zh: 只能在手机app上进行投稿。 或者通过金山文档撰写并导入。
submitRequirements_en: Submissions can only be made via the mobile app. Alternatively, you can write in WPS Docs and import the content.
